error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_Function_Function: since 1.12 (to be removed in 2.0)
Using an instance of "Twig_Function_Function" for function "switch_is_active" is deprecated since version 1.21. Use \Twig_SimpleFunction instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to switches.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
